name: Lazy Bud
description:
Lazy Bud is a game about our daily life in isolation.

Because of home office, there is a tendency of doing extra hours of work while other tasks in our daily life lose importance. We grow tired quicker and quicker and procrastinate on our tasks until tomorrow, the day after tomorrow or delay it to next month until they are eventually forgotten.

In this game, you are tasked with caring about a little character who in turn needs to take care of their daily tasks such as cooking, doing the dishes, taking a shower and so on. During this, you must pay attention to the  character's energy, a lack of which might put them to eternal sleep.

There is no restart button - it's once and never again.

This game was produced for the ZHdK Game Design Bachelor course, and has been developed within two weeks.
